name: Rube Goldberg Assignment 1
description: This is my submission to Exercise 1 - Rube Goldberg Machine for CSUY 3113. The series of events begins with a ball rolling down a ramp. The ball will bounce on a pad and knock over 5 dominoes. The last domino will fall onto a lever which will knock the next ball down a tower and into another set of dominoes. The last domino will hit a lever which will tap the last ball into a red end cup.
